duties_responsibilities.duty: Physically transport products throughout the country while complying with all state and federal laws and regulations.
Provide exceptional customer service as a representative of the company.
Drive 2019 or newer tractors and late model Great Dane refer trailers, and complete thorough vehicle safety inspections.
Legally operate in compliance with FMCSA regulations, maintain pre-scheduled appointments, and communicate any delays to dispatch.
Complete E-DVIR for mechanical conditions in need of repair and obtain necessary signatures on bills of lading.
Demonstrate a safety-first mindset and portray a clean and professional image as a representative of the company.
Choose home time options and breakdown customer orders for additional income or hire a lumping service to unload freight.
